Name: NuGet
Description: This module can be used to install NuGet packages.

Methods.Name: AddAssembly
Methods.Description: Adds an assembly reference for use by scripts.

Arguments.Name: RelativePath
Arguments.Description: The the path to the assembly relative to the Packages directory

Methods.Name: InstallPackage
Methods.Description: Installs the latest version of a package.

Methods.Name: InstallPackageIfMissing
Methods.Description: Installs the latest version of a package if it is not installed.

Methods.Name: InstallPackageVersion
Methods.Description: Installs the specified version of a package.

Methods.Name: InstallPackageVersionIfMissing
Methods.Description: Installs the specified version of a package if it is not installed.

Methods.Name: IsPackageInstalled
Methods.Description: Determines if a package is installed.

Methods.Name: IsPackageVersionInstalled
Methods.Description: Determines if a specific version of a package is installed.
